amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out the $25 million in funding for the Watershed Rehabilitation Program and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to zero out the $25 million in funding for the Watershed Rehabilitation Program and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 62 - 358 (Roll no. 306).
